Package com.wealdtech.hawk.jersey

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HawkCredentialsProvider  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HawkAuthenticationFilter<T>
    Authentication filter using the Hawk protocol.
    HawkAuthenticator<T extends HawkCredentialsProvider>
    Authenticate a request using Hawk.
    HawkPrincipalProvider<T>
    Abstract class to provide a principal given a Hawk key ID.
    HawkUnauthorizedFilter
    Response filter providing a WWW-Authenticate header for unauthorized requests with the server's current time as well as an NTP server for time synchronization, as per the Hawk specification.
